dt: {bc}of, relating to, or derived from {a_link|chromium} especially with a valence of three

shortdef: of, relating to, or derived from chromium especially with a valence of three

dt: {bc}an acid H{inf}2{/inf}CrO{inf}4{/inf} analogous to sulfuric acid but known only in solution and especially in the form of its salts

shortdef: an acid H2CrO4 analogous to sulfuric acid but known only in solution and especially in the form of its salts
